comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: The picture shows the three finned Gotha WD-8 a later design of which only one was built. This machine was allotted the German Navy Marinenummer 476, but probably by a mistake of the painter '276' was painted on the side of the fuselage. Confirmation is in the list of German Navy Serial Numbers presented by Peter M. Grosz in Over the Front Volume 14 (1999) Number 1 (Spring) page 10
